effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's [Speed]{mechanic:speed} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises [Speed]{mechanic:speed} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage} in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中の　ポケモンの
素早さを　それなりに　あげる。
ひっこめると　元に　戻る。

It sharply raises the Speed stat of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Aumenta molto la Velocità di un Pokémon in
una lotta. L’effetto svanisce se il Pokémon
è sostituito.

Cuando se usa, un Pokémon de tu equipo pierde
su objeto.

Hebt den Initiative-Wert eines Pokémon im Kampf
leicht an. Die Wirkung endet mit dem Austausch
des Pokémon.

Augmente un peu la Vitesse pendant un combat.
L’effet s’estompe si le Pokémon se retire.

배틀 중인 포켓몬의 스피드를
그럭저럭 올린다. 포켓몬을 볼에
넣어버리면 원래대로 되돌아간다.

せんとうちゅうの　ポケモンの
すばやさを　それなりに　あげる。
ひっこめると　もとに　もどる。

It sharply raises the Speed stat of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

It sharply raises the Speed stat of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Monte un peu la Vitesse pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe si
le Pokémon se retire.
